job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering activities: creating, building, updating, and keeping software functional, which aligns with traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: These activities are part of the overall software development lifecycle for a product, falling under traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of software parts and rigorous testing (unit, system-level) to ensure quality, which are fundamental software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves translating business needs (user stories) into technical requirements (acceptance tests) and aligning development with the product vision, fitting the definition of understanding business context and translating needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and code review are established software engineering practices aimed at improving code quality and knowledge sharing during the development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the application of established software engineering principles (coding, design, implementation) to create quality software components.

soft_skills.phrase: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly addresses communication, expectation setting, and fostering a positive team environment, which are core aspects of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions leveraging and sharing team knowledge, which are key aspects of collaboration and teamwork.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement exclusively details tasks related to traditional software development, such as designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software. It mentions C++ as the primary programming language and NX CAM as the software product. There is no mention of any AI, ML, or Generative AI specific tasks, models, frameworks, or tools. This aligns perfectly with the definition of a "Software Engineer" profile, which focuses solely on Macro-Category A tasks without AI/ML integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear, specific, and directly describes traditional software engineering responsibilities. There is no ambiguity regarding AI/ML involvement, making the classification straightforward.
